00017 float ArabCalc::Calculate(){
00018         float hasil;
00019         if(mode == 2) //Sufix
00020         {
00021                 hasil = CalculateSufix();
00022         }
00023         return hasil;

00026 float ArabCalc::CalculateSufix(){
00027         string dumpoperator;
00028         float dumpbil;
00029         float hasil;
00030         string ekspresitemp = ekspresi;
00031         while(ekspresitemp.length() != 0)
00032         {
00033                 char *temp =  new char[30];
00034                 int isCompleteRead = 0;
00035                 int ctemp = 0;
00036                 while(ekspresitemp[0] == '0' || ekspresitemp[0] == '1' || ekspresitemp[0] == '2' || ekspresitemp[0] == '3' || ekspresitemp[0] == '4' || ekspresitemp[0] == '5'
00037                 || ekspresitemp[0] == '6'|| ekspresitemp[0] == '7' || ekspresitemp[0] == '8' || ekspresitemp[0] == '9' || ekspresitemp[0] == '.')
00038                 {       
00039                         temp[ctemp] = ekspresitemp[0];
00040                         ekspresitemp.erase(0,1);
00041                         ctemp++;
00042                         isCompleteRead = 1;
00043                 }
00044                 if(isCompleteRead == 1)
00045                 {       
00046                         bil<< atof(temp);
00047                 }
00048                 if(ekspresitemp[0] == '+' || ekspresitemp[0] == '-' || ekspresitemp[0] == '*' || ekspresitemp[0] == ':' || ekspresitemp[0] == '/' || ekspresitemp[0] == '%' || ekspresitemp[0] == '('|| ekspresitemp[0] == ')')
00049                 {
00050                         if(operatorx.isEmpty() || ekspresitemp[0] == '(')
00051                         {
00052                                 operatorx<<ekspresitemp.substr(0,1);
00053                                 
00054                         }
00055                         else
00056                         {
00057                                 if(ekspresitemp[0] == '+' || ekspresitemp[0] == '-')
00058                                 {
00059                                         if(operatorx.getLastData() == "*" || operatorx.getLastData() == ":"|| operatorx.getLastData() == "/" || operatorx.getLastData() == "%" || operatorx.getLastData() == "+" || operatorx.getLastData() == "-")
00060                                         {
00061                                                 SmallCalculate(bil,operatorx);
00062                                                 operatorx<<ekspresitemp.substr(0,1);
00063                                         }
00064                                         else
00065                                         {
00066                                                 operatorx<<ekspresitemp.substr(0,1);
00067                                                 
00068                                         }
00069                                 }
00070                                 else if(ekspresitemp[0] == '*' || ekspresitemp[0] == '/' || ekspresitemp[0] == '%' || ekspresitemp[0] == ':')
00071                                 {
00072                                         
00073                                         if(operatorx.getLastData() == "*" || operatorx.getLastData() == "/" || operatorx.getLastData() == ":"  || operatorx.getLastData() == "%")
00074                                         {
00075                                                 SmallCalculate(bil,operatorx);
00076                                                 operatorx<<ekspresitemp.substr(0,1);
00077                                         }
00078                                         else
00079                                         {
00080                                                 operatorx<<ekspresitemp.substr(0,1);
00081                                         }
00082                                 }
00083                                 else if(ekspresitemp[0] == ')')
00084                                 {
00085                                         while(operatorx.getLastData() != "(")
00086                                         {
00087                                                 SmallCalculate(bil,operatorx);
00088                                         }
00089                                         operatorx>>dumpoperator;
00090                                 }
00091                                 
00092                         }
00093                         ekspresitemp.erase(0,1);
00094                 }
00095         }
00096         while(!operatorx.isEmpty())
00097         {
00098                 SmallCalculate(bil,operatorx);
00099 
00100         }
00101         hasil = bil.getLastData();
00102         //Cleaning
00103         while(!bil.isEmpty())
00104         {
00105                 bil>>dumpbil;
00106         }
00107         while(!operatorx.isEmpty())
00108         {
00109                 operatorx>>dumpoperator;
00110         }
00111         return hasil;
00112 }
00113 
00114 void ArabCalc::SmallCalculate(Stack<float> &bil,Stack<string> &operatorx)
00115 {
00116         float popbil1;
00117         float popbil2;
00118         string dumpoperator;
00119         float dumpbil;
00120         popbil1 = bil.getLastData();
00121         bil>>dumpbil;
00122         popbil2 = bil.getLastData();
00123         bil>>dumpbil;
00124         string popoperator = operatorx.getLastData();
00125         operatorx>>dumpoperator;
00126         if(popoperator == "*")
00127         {
00128                 bil<< popbil2*popbil1;
00129         }
00130         else if(popoperator == ":")
00131         {
00132                 bil<< popbil2/popbil1;
00133         }
00134         else if(popoperator == "/")
00135         {
00136                 int a = (int) floor(popbil2/popbil1 + 0.5);
00137                 bil<< a;
00138         }
00139         else if(popoperator == "%")
00140         {       
00141                 int tempint1 = (int) floor(popbil1 + 0.5);
00142                 int tempint2 = (int) floor(popbil2 + 0.5);
00143                 float hasil = (float)(tempint2%tempint1);
00144                 bil<< hasil;
00145         }
00146         
00147         else if(popoperator == "+")
00148         {
00149                 bil<< popbil2+popbil1;
00150         }
00151         else if(popoperator == "-")
00152         {
00153                 bil<< popbil2-popbil1;
00154         }
00155 }
